# Tech Questions

## My Company-specific questions

## [The Joel Questions (2020 version)](https://dev.to/checkgit/the-joel-test-20-years-later-1kjk)
1. Do you use Git, or some lesser source control system?

1. Can you build and release in one step?

1. Do you build and test before merging to master?

1. Do you have a bug database?

1. Do you fix bugs before writing new code?

1. Do you have an up-to-date schedule?

1. Do you write a spec before writing code?

1. Do programmers have quiet working conditions free of interruptions?

1. Do you use the best development tools money can buy?

1. Do you have human testers?

1. Do you do automated testing?

1. Do new candidates write code as part of the hiring process?

1. Do you watch people actually try to use your software?
